basic.description: This course focuses on the fundamentals of behavior analysis including selecting and defining target behaviors, determining measurement and recording methods, analyzing graphic displays of data, completing a functional analysis and the use of positive reinforcement methods of changing behavior.
basic.subject: EAB
basic.title: Basic Principles of Behavior

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EAB 3703 and EXP 3422 (or equivalents) or instructor permission.
